description: Armenians stage protests after videos emerge of soldiers captured by Azerbaijan in recent days.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh: Dozens of Armenian soldiers 'captured in raid'
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh: Dozens of Armenian soldiers 'captured in raid' - BBC News
maintext: Azerbaijan says the two villages fall under its control under the terms of the peace deal and that it launched the offensive to tackle Armenian servicemen who had refused to leave the area after the truce.
